content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for coming to see the apartment. Based on our discussions, I believe we can come to an agreement on the rental price. May I know what you were thinking of paying?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 1500 Euros per month. I would like to negotiate with you. How much are you looking for?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Maria. While I appreciate your willingness to pay 1500 Euros per month, I am looking for a higher rental price. I believe that the apartment's location, size, and other factors justify a higher rental cost. May I suggest that we explore other options to arrive at a mutually beneficial agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. I am open to negotiating. Can we discuss the reasons for the higher rental price?

I am a student, and I am looking for a modest apartment. I am not looking for a luxury apartment. I am willing to compromise on the rental price.

I am also looking for a reliable and responsible tenant. I want to make sure that the apartment is in good condition when I move out. I am willing to sign a lease agreement and pay the security deposit upfront.

I am also looking for a landlord who is easy to communicate with and who is willing to work with me to find a solution that works for both of us.

I am willing to discuss any other details that you would like to discuss.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for your understanding, Maria. I appreciate your willingness to compromise on the rental price and your willingness to sign a lease agreement and pay the security deposit upfront. While I understand that you are a student and looking for a modest apartment, I believe that the location and other factors justify a higher rental cost.

I am also looking for a reliable and responsible tenant who will take care of the apartment and not cause any damage. I want to make sure that the apartment is in good condition when you move out, and I am willing to work with you to find a solution that works for both of us.

In terms of the rental price, I am looking for something higher than 1500 Euros per month. I believe that this is a fair price based on the location and other factors. I am open to discussing other details and finding a mutually beneficial agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
